description.value:
Cold, Necrotic

Aura 2

The aura is difficult terrain for enemies. Any enemy that willingly leaves the aura takes 10 cold and necrotic damage.

When an effect pulls, pushes, or slides Kvaltigar, he can choose to move 2 squares fewer than the effect specifies. He can make a saving throw to avoid falling prone when an attack would knock him prone.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ cold, weapon

Standard

Attack: Melee 2 (one creature)

+24 vs. AC

Hit: 2d12 + 14 cold damage, or 2d12 + 4d8 + 38 cold damage on a critical hit, and the target falls prone.

At-Will ✦ cold, weapon

Standard

Attack: Ranged 10 (one creature)

+24 vs. AC

Hit: 2d12 + 14 cold damage, or 2d12 + 4d8 + 38 cold damage if Kvaltigar scores a critical hit, and Kvaltigar pulls the target up to 5 squares.

Effect: The weapon returns to Kvaltigar's hand.

At-Will

Minor

Effect: Kvaltigar changes the damage type of his weapon attacks to cold or to untyped.

Recharge when Kvaltigar hits with flying axe ✦ cold, gaze, necrotic

Minor

Attack: Ranged 5 (one creature)

+22 vs. Fortitude

Hit: 3d10 + 12 cold and necrotic damage, and Kvaltigar pulls the target up to 5 squares.

system.rechargeCondition: when Kvaltigar hits with flying axe

description.value:
Daily ✦ weapon

Minor

Effect: Close burst 5 (enemies in the burst); the target gains vulnerable 10 cold (save ends).

Encounter ✦ necrotic

Triggered

Trigger: Kvaltigar drops to 0 hit points.

Effect (Free Action): Kvaltigar uses axe. If he hits, the target also takes ongoing 10 necrotic damage (save ends).

Cha 17 (+12)
Languages Common, Giant
Alignment Chaotic Evil
Skills Athletics +20, Intimidate +17Senses Darkvision
